name: FiveByFiveNewTestamentReadingPlan
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: five bye five
des:
This skill used the Navigators 5x5 Plan (5 minutes a day, 5 times a week) to read through the New Testament. When a user first uses the skill, it will start day one. The skill will keep track of a user's progress so each time the user opens it on a new day, a new chapter will play. This skill also supports individual voice profiles and allows different members of a Household to keep their place in the reading schedule.

If a user opens the skill again on the same day it will repeat that day's reading.

If a user wants to reset the plan they can say, 'Go back to the beginning' to go back to the beginning of the plan. If they want to move to a different passage they can say, 'I want to hear something else' to be prompted to read another passage. The schedule will then be updated with the selection.

A link to the Navigator's 5x5x5 Plan can be found here: https://www.navigators.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/navtool-5x5x5.pdf
